name: yourprime-v2
description: Un creador y seguidor de rutinas de gimnasio inteligente.

scripts.build: node scripts/generateSounds.cjs && npx tailwindcss -i input.css -o www/output.css --minify && npx esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=www/index.js --sourcemap --jsx=automatic --loader:.js=jsx --loader:.ts=tsx --format=esm && npx esbuild workers/computeWorker.ts --bundle --outfile=www/computeWorker.js --format=iife --loader:.ts=tsx && npx cpx2 index.html www && npx cpx2 favicon.svg www && npx cpx2 manifest.json www && npx cpx2 service-worker.js www && npx cpx2 icon-192.png www && npx cpx2 icon-512.png www && npx cpx2 widget-template.html www && npx cpx2 public/fondo-welcome.svg www && npx cpx2 public/fondo-wizards.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupoNotificacion.svg www && npx cpx2 public/CaupolicanLogros.svg www && npx cpx2 public/CaupolicanAlerta.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-a.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-b.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-bench.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-cdl.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-sdl.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-squat.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-icon.svg www && npx cpx2 data/usdaFoundationFoods.json www/data && npx cpx2 data/usdaFoodsOffline.json www/data && npx cpx2 data/openFoodFactsOffline.json www/data
scripts.build:android: node scripts/generateSounds.cjs && npx tailwindcss -i input.css -o www/output.css --minify && npx esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=www/index.js --jsx=automatic --loader:.js=jsx --loader:.ts=tsx --format=esm && npx esbuild workers/computeWorker.ts --bundle --outfile=www/computeWorker.js --format=iife --loader:.ts=tsx && npx cpx2 index.html www && npx cpx2 favicon.svg www && npx cpx2 manifest.json www && npx cpx2 service-worker.js www && npx cpx2 icon-192.png www && npx cpx2 icon-512.png www && npx cpx2 widget-template.html www && npx cpx2 public/fondo-welcome.svg www && npx cpx2 public/fondo-wizards.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupoNotificacion.svg www && npx cpx2 public/CaupolicanLogros.svg www && npx cpx2 public/CaupolicanAlerta.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-a.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-b.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-bench.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-cdl.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-sdl.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-squat.svg www && npx cpx2 public/caupolican-icon.svg www && npx cpx2 data/usdaFoundationFoods.json www/data && npx cpx2 data/usdaFoodsOffline.json www/data && npx cpx2 data/openFoodFactsOffline.json www/data && node -e "try{require('fs').unlinkSync('www/index.js.map')}catch(e){}"
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:android && node scripts/copyRestSoundToAndroid.cjs && npx cap sync android
